briefTitle: AtriCure Bipolar Radiofrequency Ablation of Permanent Atrial Fibrillation
officialTitle: AtriCure Synergy Bipolar RF Energy Lesions for Permanent Atrial Fibrillation Treatment During Concomitant On-Pump Endo/Epicardial Cardiac Surgery
summary: ABLATE is a prospective, non-randomized multi-center clinical trial to demonstrate the safety and effectiveness of the AtriCure Bipolar System for treating permanent atrial fibrillation during concomitant on-pump cardiac surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of Patients Free From AF and Off Class I and III Anti-arrhythmic Drugs as Determined by Holter Monitoring at 6 Months.
